document.full_text: derek fisher, 36, a critical part of the lakers' chances to three-peat, is in a pitched battle with dallas's jason kidd, 38, one of the game's most gifted passers.
document.title: mavericks 96, lakers 94: lakers unravel late and mavericks seize an opportunity
lines_and_colors: derek fisher, 36, a critical part of the lakers' chances to three-peat, is in a pitched battle with dallas's jason kidd, 38, one of the game's most gifted passers.
